profileAlternative.headline: Helping companies drive innovation and transformation by making data easy to use
profileAlternative.summary:
Please contact me for more information about the worlds #1 modern database:

andy.codner@mongodb.com
609.MONGODB

Experienced hunter and business development professional with a passion for problem solving and creativity and a history of quota attainment. Accomplished in relationship management and development with clients, internal stakeholders, and partners. Track record of assessing current processes and implementing improvements that increase efficiency, accuracy, and revenue. Innovative thinker with strong attention to detail. Skilled in managing and motivating others to achieve sustainable high performance.

positions.title: Strategic Account Executive
positions.description:
MongoDB (MDB) is the worlds #1 Modern Database (DBTA Readers Choice Awards, 2017) and the database most desired by developers. By pairing the best of traditional databases with the flexibility, scalability, and performance modern use cases demand, MongoDB allows developers to develop easier, deploy faster, and scale bigger.

Manage relationships with strategic accounts. Connect developers and application architects with MongoDB experts to unleash the genius in everyone.

positions.title: Application Sales Manager
positions.description: Responsible for application sales and account management (primarily SaaS ERP, EPM, HCM, BI) to named accounts headquartered in Texas. Developed relationships with CXOs and decision makers at target organizations and built value around the efficiency, cost savings, and competitive advantage of modern applications.

positions.title: Enterprise Account Executive
positions.description:
Responsible for establishing new relationships with prospects and managing relationships with channel partners in order to drive new business growth. Consultatively identify the business and technical needs of organizational leaders and prescribe customized, industry leading solutions to fill gaps. Specialized in enabling organizations to address initiatives related to DRaaS, IaaS, and managed SAP and Oracle applications.

Promoted from Account Executive.
…
see more

positions.title: Director, Sales and Marketing
positions.description:
Hired to spearhead go to market planning, implementation, and management of new business sub-unit. Created marketing and advertising strategy, as well as a sales training and education program. Also responsible for graphics design, including company logos and collateral. Worked directly with the CEO to take ideas, formulate a business plan, hire sales representatives, manage program, and coordinate business unit operations.
…
see more

positions.title: Business Account Manager
positions.description:
Consult with local business decision makers to increase their productivity and efficiency through fully integrated solutions from AT&T. Primary focus of understanding goals and initiatives of clients and prescribing solutions that are tailored to fit the specific need of the client. Also responsible for coordinating communication between support staff and subject matter experts in order to provide customers with seamless service.


…
see more

positions.title: Marketing Intern
positions.description: Designed, implemented, and analyzed two surveys. Developed and maintained five marketing databases. Assisted with conference and trade show planning.

given.text:
"Andy and I worked together at Sungard AS. Andy is a professional in the office, and treats his peers and clients with a high level of regard. During our time working together, Andy demonstrated the ability to sell strategically and an incredible aptitude for learning new processes better than almost anyone I have ever seen. I hope one day to have the opportunity to work with him again in the future."
…
See more

received.text: Dawoud continually demonstrates the ability to build technical champions and help customers solve technical and business challenges. He operates as a thought leader in meetings, and is adept in enabling the understanding of customers. In addition, Dawoud is a great teammate, continually collaborating on strategy and planning, and communicating openly and swiftly.

Upon my joining Oracle, Trey immediately showed himself to be invaluable for my growth and development in my role. Not only was he able and willing to share his product and organizational expertise, he also had an unmatched grasp on our customer and prospect base. Trey took a leadership role with our team and partners and was a go-to for information and guidance for all members of the team, including me. He also exhibited his work ethic and drive through delivering results that consistently exceeded my expectations. Trey would be an asset to any team and is undoubtedly prepared for the next step in his career.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Regional Vice President, SouthCentral [TOLA & LATAM] (Perpetually Hiring)
Sr PM NAST at Sungard Availability Services
Chief Technology Officer at Loan Science
